dc_title_s: Colton's map of the state of Indiana, compiled from the United States Surveys & other authentic sources, exhibiting sections, fractional sections, railroads, canals &c.
dc_description_s: Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington.; Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1876 by G.W. & C.B. Colton & Co. in the Office of the Librarian of Congress, at Washington. Scale approximately 1:525,000.
